channel.title: CVE Feed for HackerOne -- serve node module
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HackerOne -- serve node module

item.title: CVE-2018-3712|2024-08-05T04:50:30.552Z -- hackerone -- serve%20node%20module
item.description: serve node module before 6.4.9 suffers from a Path Traversal vulnerability due to not handling %2e (.) and %2f (/) and allowing them in paths, which allows a malicious user to view the contents of any directory with known path.

item.title: CVE-2018-3718|2024-08-05T04:50:30.645Z -- hackerone -- serve%20node%20module
item.description: serve node module suffers from Improper Handling of URL Encoding by permitting access to ignored files if a filename is URL encoded.
